overview: Brian Bauer is a new media and start-up guy. He has built a reputation as a valued leader for start-up ventures, using his experience in mergers and acquisitions, business process and human capital management to propel high growth businesses to reach their potential. As the Vice President of Operations and Client Services at Cellit, he was the internal mobile stakeholder for numerous Fortune 500 companies and nationally recognized brands. Prior to that, he served as Vice President & General Manager of Barrington Interactive. He holds an Executive MBA at the University Of Chicago Booth School Of Business and a B.S. in Business Administration from Truman State University. He runs triathlons and is addicted to Diet Coke.
